description:
Regardless of age or musical knowledge WEJAM allows you to create beautiful melodies and connect with people around the globe for a multiplayer jam session. WEJAM is built with smart algorithms that will make your jam sessions always sound great and in tune.

Key Features:
• Realtime Multiplayer Music Making
• 100% kid-friendly, safe and anonymous (no chat, no avatars)
• Create a private jam session with just your friends or family
• Nobody online? Just jam with Loopy, a super simple recorder that's always there for you
• Various Instruments and Beats in different styles for full creative freedom
• Super intuitive: Zero musical knowledge is required to make catchy grooves
name: WEJAM
